author: @LAGirl23
content: Woke up to the smell of smoke in the air. Checked the news—another wildfire spreading fast near Malibu. Stay safe, everyone. #LAFires

author: @FireWatchLA
content: Massive flames visible from the 405 near Getty Center. Traffic is a nightmare. Please evacuate if you’re in the danger zone! #LAfire #Wildfire

author: @JohnInBurbank
content: Ash is falling like snow over Burbank right now. Can barely see the mountains through the smoke. Air quality is terrible. #StayIndoors

author: @SoCalMom
content: Schools closed today because of the fires. My kids are scared, but we’re keeping the windows shut and air purifiers running. Stay safe, LA! #WildfireSeason

author: @BreakingNewsLA
content: Evacuation orders issued for parts of Calabasas and Topanga. Fire moving fast due to Santa Ana winds. Follow @LAFD for updates. #Breaking #LAFires

author: @MikeOnTheCoast
content: The sun is a weird orange color today. Can see flames from my house in Pacific Palisades. Hoping firefighters can contain this soon. #LAFire

author: @KarlaG
content: Power just went out in our neighborhood near Woodland Hills. Not sure if it’s fire-related, but this is getting scary. #LAFire

author: @WeatherLA
content: Red Flag Warning in effect for most of LA County. High winds + dry conditions = extreme fire risk. Please be prepared. #WildfireAlert

author: @EmilyHikes
content: Just evacuated from Topanga. Smoke was thick, embers in the air. Praying for everyone still there. #LAFires

author: @LARescue
content: If you need a place to stay, shelters are open at Santa Monica High & Westwood Rec Center. DM if you need help. #WildfireRelief
